title: Icon with two bells?
body: Hey summoners, today after winning a game i checked out my icons and a new one with two bells had added to my owned icons.Also when i pres Ctrl+6 while playing a game this icon show up with a sound of bells.I was just wondering, why did i get this icon? Thanks to everyone who answers my question, have a good day.:)

replies.body: It sounds like you have the Snowdown Bells icon equipped!  You received it for buying a pack of 10 Winter Chests.  Per the [snowdown ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016#loot)page, this icon has a special emote until January 16.  Let me know if that clears things up!
